can you make revision plan for 10th class to score 95 within 10 days

# ðŸŽ¯ 10-Day Revision Plan to Score 95% in 10th Class

You can do this! Stay focused and consistent with your study plan. Here's a realistic 10-day plan to help you cover all important subjects and maximize your score.

| Day  | Focus Area                          | Activities                                               |
|-------|-----------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------|
| Day 1 | Mathematics                       | Revise key formulas, practice algebra and geometry problems. |
| Day 2 | Science (Physics)                 | Review concepts, solve numerical problems, revise laws and formulas. |
| Day 3 | Science (Chemistry)               | Study periodic table, chemical reactions, practice equations. |
| Day 4 | Science (Biology)                 | Revise human body, plant biology, diagrams, and important terms. |
| Day 5 | English (Reading & Writing)       | Practice grammar, writing essays, letters, and reading comprehension. |
| Day 6 | Social Studies (History)           | Revise important dates, events, and causes/effects of historical events. |
| Day 7 | Social Studies (Geography)         | Study maps, important geographical phenomena, and environmental topics. |
| Day 8 | Mathematics                      | Solve previous year question papers, focus on weak areas. |
| Day 9 | Science                         | Solve sample papers for Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. |
| Day 10| Social Studies & English         | Revise key points, practice writing and reading, quick revision of all subjects. |

### Suggested Free Resources:
- **Khan Academy** (khanacademy.org): Free videos and practice exercises for all subjects.
- **NCERT Textbooks PDF** (ncert.nic.in): Official textbooks for clear concepts and exercises.
- **Toppr** (toppr.com): Offers free study materials and practice tests for 10th class students.

Keep a positive mindset, take short breaks, and reward yourself after each dayâ€™s study. Youâ€™ve got this! ðŸš€
